name: Image Cutter
description:
An easy way to cut any image into pieces.


It's useful when you only need some parts of the screenshot to make a mood board or just rearrange them.

Here is an example of how it works.


How to use:

  1. Paste image or screenshot
  2. Draw shapes over the parts you need
  3. Select image and shapes and run this plugin


Tip: try using a pen tool to draw shapes on top of your image.
